Producer: Nancy Leopardi, Ross Kohn, Santosh Govindaraju, Vincent Newman, Dan Reardon, John Slattery
Production Co: Convergent Media., Vincent Newman Entertainment, Aperture Media Partners, Indy Entertainment, Dutch FilmWorks
Rating: R (Language Throughout|Drug Use|Brief Nudity|Some Sexual Material|Violence)
Synopsis: Police Chief Sanders investigates the bizarre murders of two women with the same name and unravels a web of small-town lies. He meets and quickly falls for Rita, a nosy neighbor who is eager to help solve the mystery.
Title: Maggie Moore(s)
